title: Alarm System, Walk-In Closets, On-Site Maintenance, Additional Storage
posting_body: ['Newport Village', '1827 West Gowan Road , North Las Vegas, NV, 89032', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 66', 'OR Text', '66', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'LOCATION.', 'COMMUNITY.', 'QUALITY LIVING.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1130 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Newport Village is located in North Las Vegas.', 'We offer 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for rent.', 'Amenities include gated access, fitness center, resort style pool and spa, playground, patio or balcony, private garages available, ceiling fans, microwaves, washer and dryer included, extra storage available and pets are welcome (up to 25 pounds)!', 'Take a virtual tour of our amazing property and get ready to call us home!', 'Features', '- Refrigerator', '- Carpet', '- Additional Storage', '- Air Conditioner', '- Alarm System', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Dishwasher', '- WiFi Ready Home with Pre-Installed Modem', '- Range', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Dryer', '- Wheelchair Accessible', '- First Month of WiFi FREE for New Cox Customers', '- Balcony/Patio', '- Washer', '- Tub/Shower', 'Community Amenities', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Gated Community', '- Internet Access: High-Speed Available', '- Clubhouse', '- Playground', '- Fitness Center', '- Online Payments Available', '- Garages', '- 2 Swimming Pools', '- Volleyball Court', '- Storage', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome up to 25 pounds (at mature weight).', 'Please contact our leasing department and one of our expert staff members will review the policies with you.', 'Cats Allowed', 'Dogs Allowed', 'Please note we charge a $300 non-refundable pet fee and $25 per month pet rent.', '9we9F83n02']
